author: Special Correspondent
text:
A gang of thieves broke into the house of an IT professional in J.P. Nagar II Phase and stole gold jewellery, Rs. 35,000, a laptop and two iPads. The complainant, Gourav, and his wife are software professionals. They were at work when their home was burgled on Friday.

They found their house ransacked on returning home in the evening. The police said the thieves had broke open the front door to gain access to the house.
title: Techie’s house burgled
